body.name: RCA RMW953-RED Microwave Oven, 900 Watts with 10 Power Levels, Red
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock (more on the way).
features: POWERFUL: This bright coloured countertop microwave oven has 900 Watts in a 0.9 Cu. Ft. footprint

FUNCTIONS: Equipped 10 Microwave power levels to help provide efficient results each and every time. It also has an auto-defrost menu by weight and a 6-One touch functions including, pizza, popcorn, baked potato etc.
INTERIOR LIGHT & CHILD LOCK: The safety lock prevents unsupervised operation by children. Interior light for checking the status without having to open the doors.
DIGITAL DISPLAY: Soft-touch electronic control panel and convenient auto-cook menu. Digital clock and kitchen timer.
DESIGN - Vibrant colour that stands out in all decor styles. And a sleek curved handle for a modern design.
body.description: With a 0. 9-Cubic-Foot capacity, this RCA microwave oven allows for quick and convenient meal preparation. The unit's one-touch auto-cook menu takes the guesswork out of cooking popularly microwaved foods including popcorn, baked potatoes, pizza, beverages, and frozen dinners, while its reheat button makes it easy to warm food items back up again. The microwave's soft-touch electronic control panel also comes with cook-by-weight and defrost-by-weight options, speed defrost that alternates between defrost and stand times for efficient results, a start/stop button, and a reset button to clear all previous settings. Choose from 10 power levels for added versatility and control. Other highlights include a removable glass turntable, a handy digital clock and kitchen timer, child safety-lock protection, and an end-of-cycle audio signal, which helps prevent mugs of reheated tea or coffee from being forgotten about. The glass turntable cleans up easily by hand or in the dishwasher, and the interior and exterior of the appliance can be wiped down with a damp cloth as needed. With 900W of power, this microwave is powerful enough for all your cooking needs. This RCA microwave has a sleek design and would add some flare to any kitchen, dorm or office.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The RCA RMW953 0.9 Cu Ft Countertop Microwave makes cooking and reheating meals or beverages simple, quick, and convenient. With adjustable power settings, a defrost program, and weight adjustment, this microwave oven provides a range of options for completing any of your cooking duties.

With its elegant red finish and classic design, this microwave can complement a variety of kitchen designs. Its practical functions will meet your heating and cooking needs. The user experience is further enhanced by thoughtful features such as an easy-to-read control panel, shockproof bar, and child safety lock. Specifications 900 watts with 10 power levels Oven Capacity: 0.9 cu. ft. Turntable diameter: 10.6’’ External dimensions: 23.5 x 20 x 13 inches Item Weight: 32 lbs

CONVENIENT DESGINS & FEATURES Defrost anything! To expedite your culinary attempts, defrost by time or weight. Cook in stages for customized meals and snacks. CONTROL AND SAFETY With an LED cavity light, this RCA microwave oven provides a crystal-clear inside view during the cooking of your meals. The control panel also includes choices for express cooking, altering the power level, postponing the start, setting the time, and stop/cancel features. To prevent inadvertent usage or access by children, use the child safety option to lock the control panel. COMPACT SIZE This microwave has a higher internal capacity than the average microwaves, despite being smaller in size. Its only 29” length makes it excellent for apartment kitchens, holiday homes, workplaces, and dorm rooms, but it still has enough capacity for ordinary dishes. DIFFERENT SETTINGS Choose from six different auto cooking settings (popcorn, baked potato, pizza, frozen, reheat, beverage). Convenient digital buttons let you cook or reheat your favorite foods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working right and in good condition
reviews.reviewText: I like my microwave oven a lot. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this microwave it’s look more expensive than it was ,love the look

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use easily and like the color
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and the color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Received the wrong model
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the stainless model for my mom and had it sent to her house. The good reviews and the pull handle door are why I ordered it...she wanted the pull handle type. What I received was a similar model (RMW1178-B) that does not have a pull handle. Besides that being aggravating, if you lightly press on the button to open the door the microwave will power up and run as long as you hold it. I looked in the manual to see if this was an intentional feature, but found nothing about it. My mom said it works good, but I'm wondering how long that will be with the opener doing that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This microwave is horrible! First use it smelled like it was on fire. It worked for 3 weeks and quit! Every use it smelled horrible! Don't waste your money on this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Form follows function
reviews.reviewText: I never knew RCA made microwaves. I needed to replace my old microwave and, after years of owning a black one, I wanted to replace it with a cheerful color - RED! It arrived early and was well packaged. Not much of a learning curve. Operation is similar to my old one. Even though it's only a compact o.9 cu. ft. , my large dinner plate fits nicely inside. Very pleased with purchase. I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I am not sure I only ordered it because it looks like the best deal for my money. My grandson loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Perfect...not to big....not to small...for my small kitchen....cooking watts just right...and it continues to beep till you take out your food ...and the noise level is perfect...put shelving on top for spices.
So far so good, works great. Love the colour. As some of the reviews stated before we purchased this item, the plastic protective covering is difficult to remove from the seams.
Perfect little microwave fits a dinner plate np

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful like photo, but hard to clean.
reviews.reviewText: The microwave looks great, delivery was efficient. The price was perfect. It is only the finish on it I really don't like. It isn't easy to clean, the outside can't be cleaned with anything wet. It needs buffing after every use. You just look at it and there are finger prints everywhere. As a red appliance is meant to stand out. This part of the design needs better thinking. Never seen a microwave quite this hard to keep clean.

We like this microwave a lot. Cute, compact. It heats quickly. Only 2 things I would mention is that it is not the quietest unit I have ever owned (but it's not super noisy either) and also it's missing a quick minute button where you don't also have to press "Start". (Or a quick 30-second button.) We sure loved that feature on our old microwave oven. Another reviewer mentioned a smell. We haven't found that our unit had a smell. We've been using ours for 5 weeks now and are very happy with the purchase so far.
I expected high performance from RCA, and I got it. It works great, and that dark metallic red colour looks fabulous in my kitchen! I hope it lasts a long, long time, because I love it.
